text.0:
PDI’s Brigette Villarin: “COVID pushed us to rely on technology, to do everything online from grocery delivery to shopping within communities.”

https://t.co/ct1IoNi87g
text.1:
COMMENTARY: Instead of harping on Robredo and, in the process, putting Duterte in deeper trouble with their convoluted defense of him, Panelo and Roque should just admit their failure in communicating the government’s response to calamities and Covid-19.

https://t.co/MH8t2kyRTW
